subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cocaine and Crack Cocaine
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: An arbitration panel decided that the Belgian sprint star Tom Boonen could race in the Tour de France despite his positive out-of-competition test for cocaine.
snippet: An arbitration panel decided that the Belgian sprint star Tom Boonen could race in the Tour de France despite his positive out-of-competition test for cocaine.
